txt.en: Damrod can be found in Barad Orhant in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should bring the pendants collected from the Cargûl to Damrod.
Cargûl can be found in the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should collect pendants from them as they fall.

'Dolenthol tells me that the merrevail are grasping anything they found throughout the Circle of Sorrow, and winging them away for some foul but unknown purpose. Now, I have seen Cargûl wearing vile pendants, and I think we should keep them from the clutching talons of the merrevail. Find them and bring them back to me, and I will destroy them.'
'I thank you for these, [placeholder]. I will have these vile pendants destroyed immediately. You have done the Rangers of Ithilien a great service.'
Damrod wishes to gather the pendants of Cargûl who wander the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.
Bring the Cargûl pendants to Damrod in Barad Orhant
